data.text: @MeatMechSuit It’s not cool to die in hospital either.
@MrHilariouskiwi Even with all their caveats, it’s not cool.

@MeatMechSuit Oh & 3) long COVID is a serious risk 
They don't even have to pay if they really don't want to.
Kiwis will pay $1.90 for a reusable respirator.
Ditto parents chipping in for a HEPA filter to protect their kids.
Those that can't, the govt can help.
Free effective COVID prevention.

@MeatMechSuit Agree. It's so stupid. The things we're not doing would slash transmission and are practically free.
All the govt has to do is make a couple of announcements, something they're really good at.
1) It's airborne. Wear an n95/kf94/kn95.
2) Put a HEPA filter in public indoor spaces.
@MeatMechSuit In full PPE for the day is what is not being said.
@MeatMechSuit Unbelievable isn't it. Everyday I feel like I've woken up in upside down land.

@MeatMechSuit I don't think history, let alone folks like you and I, will look back on this moment kindly.

It's been devastating to see. It's not that it's a far more transmittable variant! We gave up.

This will 💯 cause healthcare workers to not rest and recover properly and increase the likelihood of long covid in our healthcare workforce. 

Short term blinkered desperate thinking.
We went from a world-leading covid response to doing almost every bungle other countries have done. My god.
